belongs_to_collection.name: Mile High Media's Gay Gapes Series

overview: Denton gets Paul a new massage table and he is thrilled. Denton thinks that Paul should do some practicing on him. Benjamin and Chris are playing a long game of chess. Benjamin gets mad at Chris for taking too long, so he decides to make his own moves. Luke wakes up Adam with a bottle of champagne for his birthday, but that’s not the only gift he gives him. Tony is busy watching some gay porn and wishing he could fuck some tight man ass. When David comes into the picture he makes Tony’s fantasy come true.
title: Gay Gapes 1
